item.description:
Come one, come all... newcomers strongly encouraged to turn out! We're still having a meetup in two weeks, but in the spirit of biweekly meetings, we're having another one this Wednesday.

We will talk about related groups in Boston, Wikipedia research, speakers and events for the rest of the year (including free culture et al), and Wikimania 2007 in Taipei next summer.

People should come to have fun and hang out. Look for the people wearing Wikimania t-shirts when you come in... extras are still available, so let me know if you want me to bring any along.

Rock on,
SJ
617 529-4266
item.name: Meet related groups! Wikipedia research & Mania 2007 in Taipei
